tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID NOT NULL,
    receiver_id UUID NOT NULL,
    message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id UUID,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date DATE,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE conversations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user1_id INT,
    user2_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ChatMessages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Conversations (
    conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user1_id UUID,
    user2_id UUID,
    last_message_id UUID,
    unread_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE MessageReactions (
    reaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    reaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
